issue.title: [Java] Support additional Date metadata
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-701](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-701). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The Date type format from ARROW-316 introduced a DateUnit
